What's the word, Johannesburg?

Just a super cool cat doin' some code stuff...

I'm Amir. I'm a CMS Production Lead Developer at Simpleview. I build websites for the tourism industry; in fact two of my sites were in the top 25 tourism websites of 2016 which was pretty damn cool. Check them out when you've got a free moment: Visit Norway and Experience Columbus.

When I'm not building websites, I am usually chillin' with my homies and my main man, The Monarch. Which is totally not code for just playing video games with my fiancÃ©e, ðŸ˜‰.

Experience
Simpleview, Inc.

This is my current gig. Simpleview is the market leader in digital solutions for the tourism industry. I lead a production team, we're the ones who build the websites. I created our code style guide and present on topics such as performant web animations and progressive enhancement.

Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC.

I was contracted to work on their redesign. I worked on some backend code to handle user profile updates and show/season routes. The site was built on the LAMP stack using Laravel.

SWS Electronics, Corp.

I was brought on board to finish development of their website. I ended up doing a complete responsive redesign. The site is built on top of the Magento CMS and estore.
